Question: After the game, this person was awarded Player of the Week honors for the third time that season.
Hints: The first this person Bowl was held on September 10, 2006 and Peyton's Colts defeated Eli's Giants by a score of 26–21.
They trailed 17–7 in the 2nd quarter before this person found Dallas Clark for a 2-yard TD to end the half 17–14.
These encounters have been colloquially named "The ____ Bowl".
